Name: 1st District
Description: A mixed-use area combining light industrial zones with residential blocks and local shops.

Name: 2nd District
Description: A predominantly residential district with parks, schools, and a growing commercial area.

Name: 3rd District
Description: A quieter district with family homes, local businesses, and proximity to green spaces.

Name: 4th District
Description: An industrial zone with warehouses, light manufacturing, and small-scale commercial operations.
